title: Springer (architecture)
text: A springer is an architectural term for the lowest <a href="voussoir">voussoir</a> on each side of an <a href="arch">arch</a>. Since it is the bottom-most element of the arch, it is where the arch support terminates at the <a href="respond">respond</a>. It rests on the <a href="impost%20%28architecture%29">impost</a> or pier of the arch, that is, the topmost part of the <a href="abutment">abutment</a>, from which the arch arises.
